head.title: Coronavirus Family Resource Center – Health Department – Cranbury School District

meta.name: description
meta.content: The Cranbury School is a Pre-K to grade 8 elementary school with a total school population of 496 students, tucked away on Main Street in Cranbury, New Jersey. Our high school-aged children attend Princeton High School.

li.a: School Hours - Regular Day, Shortened Day, Early Dismissal

img.alt: Two girls in classroom looking to their left

div.p: Learn about our history, operations, performance and vision for the future.

li.a: Purchasing: Requests for Proposal, Bids, Etc.

div.p: We are committed to transparency. This section features Board of Education information, including meeting schedules, budget and financial information and how to contact our elected representatives.

img.alt: Library desk with stacked and open book

div.p: Our curriculum maps and resources can help you understand what we teach and the our plans for delivering differentiated, meaningful instruction in all areas of our curriculum.
The Cranbury School District offers a variety of programs and services in order to create a comprehensive educational experience.

img.alt: Girls sitting in front of lockers

div.p: This section features much of the “day-to-day”’ information our students and families need.

img.alt: Tiles on a scrabble board spelling out the words school, learn and math

div.p: This section features information from and ways to connect with the organizations, officials and agencies who support the Cranbury School District.

div.strong:
CORONAVIRUS FAMILY RESOURCE CENTER
As a reminder, school will remain closed through at least May 15, 2020.

td.div:
Teacher Webpages - Visit your homeroom teacher's Webpage to log in your attendance for the day.
K-5 teachers will email daily newsletters to parents with the day's assignments, using the family email address.
6-8 students should log onto their homeroom teacher's webpage to log their attendance and should follow a half-day schedule to visit the appropriate Google Classroom.
Teachers will be available between 8:30 and 12:30 / 1:15 to 3:15 daily for emails.
